A cool CLI to do things

A longer, probably multiline description

Usage: test [OPTIONS] COMMAND

Commands:
  sub1	Do one thing
  sub2	Do another thing

Options:
      --count int   Count something (default -1)
  -d, --delete      Delete something
  -h, --help        Show help for test
  -v, --version     Show version info for test

Use "test [command] -h/--help" for more information about a command.
